data.title: Tableau: Business Intelligence and Analytics Software
data.description: Tableau can help anyone see and understand their data. Connect to almost any database, drag and drop to create visualizations, and share with a click.
data.content:

===============

The future of analytics has arrived. Meet Tableau Next.
=======================================================

Unlock your data’s full potential with agentic analytics. Deliver trusted insights for everyone and enrich agents with Tableau Next, built on Salesforce and integrated with Agentforce.

[Learn more](https://www.tableau.com/products/tableau-next) [Try Tableau Cloud for free](https://www.tableau.com/products/trial)

Get the latest from Tableau.
----------------------------

* * *

* * *

[![Image 4: Tableau Conference | April 15-17, 2025 | San Diego and Salesforce+](https://www.tableau.com/sites/default/files/2025-01/Get-the-latest-from-Tableau-605x302-2X--1-.png) ### Register now for Tableau Conference 2025. Activate your data superpowers with Tableau and Agentforce at the must-attend data and analytics event of the year. Register now](https://www.salesforce.com/tableau-conference/?utm_source=tableau&utm_medium=web-login-promo&utm_campaign=TableauDotCom-HP-WN_TC25_RegLaunch_IP%20&d=701ed00000FGyh7AAD)

[![Image 5: Tableau+ screenshots with purple gradient background](https://www.tableau.com/sites/default/files/2024-06/TabPlus_800x447_0.png) #### Tableau+: New Edition with Premium AI, Enterprise Capabilities, and Premier Success Learn more](https://www.tableau.com/pricing/tableau-plus)

[![Image 6: ECT link graphic](https://www.tableau.com/sites/default/files/2024-09/ECT-link-2.jpg) #### Accelerate data-driven decisions with a trusted AI assistant. Learn more](https://www.tableau.com/tableau-agent)

[![Image 7: woman holding up cellphone](https://www.tableau.com/sites/default/files/2024-09/Screenshot-2024-09-12-at-9.08.14-AM.png)](https://www.tableau.com/#content-564221)

### Have you checked your Pulse today?

Want to get the pulse on your business? See how you can get your teams on the same page with AI-powered insights from Tableau Pulse. Get personalized, contextualized, and intelligent insights when and where you need them.

[Watch now](https://www.tableau.com/#content-564221)

Tableau helps people see, understand, and act on data
-----------------------------------------------------

Our visual analytics platform is transforming the way people use data to solve problems. See why organizations of all sizes trust Tableau to help them be more data-driven.

![Image 8](https://www.tableau.com/sites/default/files/2023-07/united-by-data-Thumbnail%402x.png)

### [United by data](https://www.tableau.com/community)

There is no single way to accelerate your Tableau journey, but all roads lead through the Tableau Community. With more than a million members, here you have the power to connect with like-minded people, learn, grow, and be inspired—wherever you are in the world.

[Our Community](https://www.tableau.com/community)

![Image 9](https://www.tableau.com/sites/default/files/2023-07/broadest-deepest-Thumb%402x-cropped.png)

### [The world’s broadest, deepest analytics platform](https://www.tableau.com/products/our-platform)

Deploy in the cloud, on-premises, or natively integrate with Salesforce CRM. Connect to all of your data with fully integrated AI/ML capabilities, governance and data management, visual storytelling and collaboration.

[The Tableau Platform](https://www.tableau.com/products/our-platform)

![Image 10](https://www.tableau.com/sites/default/files/2023-07/intuitive-products-Thumb%402x-cropped.png)

### [Intuitive products](https://www.tableau.com/products)

We believe data analysis should be about asking questions and not about learning software. With built-in visual best practices, Tableau provides limitless data exploration without interrupting your flow of analysis. That’s why people love using Tableau.

[Explore our Products](https://www.tableau.com/products)

![Image 11](https://www.tableau.com/sites/default/files/2023-07/Data%20culture.png)

### [Your partner to build a data culture](https://www.tableau.com/why-tableau/data-culture)

Customers are scaling Tableau faster and more broadly than ever. As a trusted partner, Tableau helps organizations accelerate innovation, improve operations, and better serve their customers. See how Tableau can help you realize the value of your analytics investments, by embracing a data culture.

[Learn more](https://www.tableau.com/why-tableau/data-culture)

![Image 12: Iron Viz](https://cdns.tblsft.com/sites/default/files/pages/2019ironvizlogo_white-01.png)

Viz what you love
-----------------

#### Join the global qualifier today

[Get Started](https://www.tableau.com/community/iron-viz)

Create and share on Tableau Public
----------------------------------

Join the newsletter and find daily inspiration with the Viz of the Day. Yours could be featured next!

[Explore the viz gallery](https://public.tableau.com/app/discover/viz-of-the-day)

[![Image 13: Tableau Public Viz of the Day](https://www.tableau.com/sites/default/files/2025-03/Screenshot-2025-03-06-at-5.35.39-PM.png)](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/kevin.flerlage/viz/YadaYadaYada-WhosTalkingonSeinfeld/YadaYadaYada-WhosTalkingonSeinfeld)

### Yada Yada Yada

This #VizOfTheDay by Kevin Flerlage breaks down dialogue in an American television sitcom—exploring who’s talking, what they’re saying, and who they’re talking to. Explore this #DataPlusTV viz.

[Interact with the viz](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/kevin.flerlage/viz/YadaYadaYada-WhosTalkingonSeinfeld/YadaYadaYada-WhosTalkingonSeinfeld)

[![Image 14: 4 Tips for Getting Started with the Tableau Community](https://www.tableau.com/sites/default/files/2024-01/DataFam-explained-EP1_800x447.png)](https://www.tableau.com/#content-543007)

### DataFam Explained

The #DataFam is your gateway to unlimited learning, inspiration and connection. Discover four tips to connect with other Tableau users passionate about data visualization, analytics, and data storytelling.

[Watch now](https://www.tableau.com/#content-543007)

Cookie Consent Manager
----------------------

*   ### General Information
    
*   ### Required Cookies
    
*   ### Functional Cookies
    
*   ### Advertising Cookies
    

#### General Information

We use three kinds of cookies on our websites: required, functional, and advertising. You can choose whether functional and advertising cookies apply. Click on the different cookie categories to find out more about each category and to change the default settings.  
[Privacy Statement](https://www.salesforce.com/company/privacy/full_privacy/)

#### Required Cookies

Always Active

Required cookies are necessary for basic website functionality. Some examples include: session cookies needed to transmit the website, authentication cookies, and security cookies.

Cookies Details‎

#### Functional Cookies

 Functional Cookies

Functional cookies enhance functions, performance, and services on the website. Some examples include: cookies used to analyze site traffic, cookies used for market research, and cookies used to display advertising that is not directed to a particular individual.

Cookies Details‎

#### Advertising Cookies

 Advertising Cookies

Advertising cookies track activity across websites in order to understand a viewer’s interests, and direct them specific marketing. Some examples include: cookies used for remarketing, or interest-based advertising.

Cookies Details‎
